Hello~ 

Been hearing this group for the longest time but never paid attention to 
them until now and I gotta say they are pretty good. This is the first BAP 
MV thay I've seen and this song in particular has this 90s feel. Can 
someone tell me who's who? The guy in the "BOY" hat in particular lol (I 
like the way he raps), and the other guy with like the corn dreads or 
whatever you call it and the one in red wjo did the high note lmao so 
basically every member, can anyone tell me the members and their roles? 
Okay so I know there's a guy named Zelo but I don't really know him by face 
lol. Pleeeaasseeee~﻿

comments.author: 2SeungGDaeYang

comments.text:
I can help I've been a Baby for awhile.
The one with the boy's hat is the youngest member Zelo he is one of the 
rappers of the group. He is extremely adorable although he has definitely 
matured over the time they have been active.
Daehyun has on the red jacket with the printed T-shirt. He is a main 
vocalist and food lover of the group.
The one with the dreads is their leader Bang Yonnguk he is the lead rapper 
of the group and his voice has many girls panties dropping ;)
Himchan was the one with the red suit and red pants. (Although the red kept 
switching between him and Youngjae the lead vocalist) He is the visual of 
the group :D he is so cute he also does sub-vocals and sub-rapping
Youngjae is the lead vocalist he had on the jacket with the blue stars on 
the side at one point. :D He is one of the goofiest members of the group 
him; Daehyun and Jongup (Lead dancer) always make me laugh
Jongup is the lead dancer he is a really damn good dancer. He is the one 
who has on the black hoodie.
Welcome to the family :D

2014 was a horrible year for K-pop. 
I hope things turn around this year.
No one will get into any accidents.
No idols will be exploited.
Groups won't be torn apart.
I'm still praying that Bighit, YG or JYP will swoop in and take in BAP... 
but..it probably won't happen..
#foreverwithbap
As long as they're happy and healthy, I'm okay.﻿

something slightly similar to B.A.P, and they came back about a year later, 
i think, under a new company- Seven Seasons!!! It is possible for B.A.P 
too, so don't worry about it too much. As long as they are healthy and 
happy, that's all that matters right? :)
comments.author: zelo naekkeoya

comments.text:

returned but I do know that for Luhan and Kris that left EXO, the company

comments.text:
+Adara J. If someone were to try to take in BAP they'd have to change the 
name and the mascot and the fan names... and most companies have 1-3 groups 
they like to focus on so they might not want to get involved with BAP 
especially if there were a risk of TS making an issue out of "their group" 
being taken in by someone else. I don't think it's happened before either

comments.text:
Well this song stays forever young... I loved that they were one of the 
band that really had no problems before and all but now that, and this 
lawsuit is just crazy...
First its SM stuff with Leetuk, Seconds comes WuFan followed by LuHan and 
now TS with a whole group BAP... ITS JUST From 2014-2015... Its jus 
amazing...
I just have to say that its not fare for the company to do something like 
that to them and I am hoping that they will solve it soon before we even 
notice...
I always have so many things to write and it always almost never makes 
sense.
Well Its that I know all you want to help but its just I don't think 
avoiding the truth will help. And by that what I mean is that avoiding TS 
won't help them... There are other ways to help them but I don't think 
Avoiding is the right was...
I am just saying, no hates...
I also want to support and I've been trying...
LOVE BAP FOREVER AND ALWAYS>>>>>/~<3﻿
